906348212.title: Water Purifier Vol.-Hippies
906348212.description:
Water Purifier Vol.-Hippies

Water purifier - was made on the principle of Volkswagen Bus T1, which became a cult in the 60-70 years, was nicknamed "hippie-mobile".
On this skin I tried to save the form of Volkswagen Bus T1 and changed the logo in order

851357517.title: Old Vacuum Cleaner
851357517.description: Someone converted a vintage vacuum cleaner into the water tank - what an odd thing to do.

827979314.title: 'TOYSHOP' Purifier
827979314.description:
Lego head inspired bottle with danger signage for contaminated water, scrap copper tubing sections all brazed into a condensor pipe for that high quality H20!

Please dont worry about the bloody rag I had to use on the condensor pipe... its not my blood.
